primevc.gui.behaviours.layout.ValidateLayoutBehaviour

type
class
extends
primevc.gui.behaviours.ValidatingBehaviour<primevc.gui.core.IUIElement>
implements
primevc.gui.traits.IPropertyValidator
Instance will trigger layout.validate on a 'enterFrame event' when the layout is invalidated or when the target is added to the stage with an invalidated layout.
